metadata.name: Too Close to Focus
metadata.description:
It's difficult to write an artist statement and look objectively at your work. That being said, here are some things that I can confidently say about this piece. 

Im interested in the way fire can transform things permanently. 

I believe fire has the ability to create beauty through destruction or transformation. 

This the first image I've taken that accurately represents what I was feeling while contemplating plasma.

Jpeg created on a DSLR
2015
2000x2000 PX
